Title: U.S. Federal Investigators Are Reportedly Looking Into Codecov Security Breach, Undetected for Months
Description: U.S. federal investigators are purportedly looking into a security breach at Codecov, a platform used to test software code with more 29,000 customers worldwide, Reuters reported on Saturday. The company has confirmed the breach and stated that it went undetected for months.

Title: How M1 Macs feel faster than Intel models: it’s about QoS
Description: By segregating macOS background tasks on Efficiency cores, M1 Macs can run user apps unfettered on their Performance cores. And that feels really fast.

Title: Azurite and Table Storage in a dev container | I CAN MAKE THIS WORK
Description: It's great to be able to develop locally without needing a "real" database to connect to. Azurite is an Azure Storage emulator which exists to support just that. This post demonstrates how to run Azurite v3 in a dev container, such that you can access the Table Storage API, which is currently in preview.
